events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but I need to request a refund because the size is incorrect and doesn't fit me at all.
The system has classified this case as a refund request due to the customer's need to return the item for a money back process.
A customer service agent was assigned to handle the refund case regarding the jacket return initiated by the customer just now.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like to request a refund for the jacket you purchased. Let's work together to get this resolved as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and still in its original packaging?
Sure, my order number is 4587321. The jacket is still unused, and I kept it in the original packaging because I want to return it but need a full refund.
Thank you for the details. We can process a full refund once we receive the returned jacket. I will send you the prepaid return shipping label to your email shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and the prepaid label. I appreciate the smooth handling of this issue and will send the package today.
We have received your returned jacket in good condition and processed your full refund. The amount should reflect in your bank account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you for your excellent support throughout this process. I will definitely shop with you again.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for your cooperation and feedback. Feel free to reach out anytime for future assistance.
We have sent you a brief customer satisfaction survey. We would appreciate your feedback to help us improve our service.
